pr_title: Add branch protection and status check require

timeline.message: Add branch protection and status check require

timeline.bodyText: These contexts are not exactly the same as what we see in the PR page, thus I fork and set in my forked repo and use GitHub API to see what the context is, hopefully it's right
timeline.author: kezhenxu94
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -31,3 +31,15 @@ github:
     squash:  true
     merge:   false
     rebase:  false
+  protected_branches:
+    master:
+      required_status_checks:
+        strict: true
+        contexts:
+          - CI
+          - Single
+          - Storage
+          - Cluster
